message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel approach for continual learning using reinforcement learning strategies to search for the best neural architecture for each task. This involves deep learning techniques and classification tasks, which are commonly associated with the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV), and natural language processing (cs.CL). However, since the paper focuses on deep learning and classification tasks, the first three sub-categories are more likely to be relevant.
